comments.author: AdelphiA.9287
comments.body: Tequatl has no “pre-events”. He spawns on a timer. There are other events which are “linked” but they are not pre-requisites like others have (underworld forces etc. for Behemoth). Please correct me if I’m wrong…

comments.author: das moran fool.1072
comments.body: No, tequatl goes through the preparation phase before going active. From my server (Gandara):

comments.author: Healix.5819
comments.body:
Every event is different so you can’t just trust the status of the event. Some events may reset to warmup while others reset to preparation or something else. Only the active status can be trusted and in some cases, like for Tequatl, the event can turn active about a minute before it actually happens in-game.

Tequatl will go from warmup to active to success then back to warmup.

comments.author: Ice of Dragons.1637
comments.body: I wonder if tequatl is always in warmup while not active ? i tried several different servers and always the same resolute. Are the servers in the same event time zone ?
